body_html:
Hey, the problem is that you are passing 'epoch' as the 4th argument to 'train_model' which I guess is an int (and not a scheduler).

Also, it's best if you ask about errors on the forums. ( https://discuss.pytorch.org )

Also, it's best if you ask about errors on the forums. ( https://discuss.pytorch.org )
body:
Hey, the problem is that you are passing 'epoch' as the 4th argument to 'train_model' which I guess is an int (and not a scheduler).

Also, it's best if you ask about errors on the forums. ( https://discuss.pytorch.org )
